parking:
Talk about any important aspects such as the driveway being steep, what to consider when it snows or rains, parking restrictions, how easy or difficult to park during certain times of the day, or potential issues guests may encounter.

If your property is in an urban area, share information about free and metered parking, parking garages, and other options.  If one is available, try adding an image or link to a parking map.  This is very helpful for guests visiting the city.

Our driveway comfortably fits 4-5 regular sized vehicles.  Make sure to lock your car door and do not leave any valuables.   We will not be responsible for lost or stolen items left in your vehicle.
houserules:
Setting clear expectations for your guests is key to being a successful host.  House rules should be concise and easy to understand. 

Our House, Our Rules 

Being mindful of our house rules is appreciated and expected.  We hope you love our space and will help us take care of it. 

  • No House Parties
  • Strict no pets policy.  Pet cleaning fees start at $500
  • Strict no smoking or vaping indoors policy.  You may smoke/vape outside.  Smoke remediation fees start at $1000
  • Please clean up excessive messes, we’ll take care of the rest
checkin:
Check-In any time after 4 pm
Instructions with property address, smart lock code, Wi-Fi, etc…will be sent 1-2 days before your arrival.

 

Check-Out is at 10 am
Checkout instructions and useful Info: 

  • Load all dishes in the dishwasher and run on normal cycle
  • Remove and dispose of open food from fridge
  • Leave any beds that have been slept in, unmade
  • Leave used towels in the bathtub or shower floor
  • Take out all trash, including from bathrooms and dispose in bear-proof trash containers. Located by front / side of home or at the end of driveway.

 

Also before checkout, please let us know how we might improve overall guest experience, any issues that should be addressed, or if you noticed parts of our home needing repair. 

* Important - Our cleaners are very busy and require the entire time to prepare for the next guest. We charge a $25 fee for every 15 minutes after the scheduled checkout time of 10 a.m. EST.
amenities: We offer everything you’ll need for an enjoyable stay.  If you have specific requirements or have any questions about our property amenities, just ask.
name: My New Property
howto:
Each property has its own unique aspects and features.  Here you’ll be able to add instructions, images, or videos explaining how to use, operate, or do things.  We’ve add some general videos to get you started.

How to use the Keurig coffee maker (embed video)

 

How to operate the fireplace (embed video)


How to light pilot on gas fireplace (embed video)
popular:
Let guests know about all the transportation options available.  By letting them know what to use or avoid will get you one step closer to a 5-star experience. 

Don’t forget to add valuable links, images, or embed videos
description:
Welcome To Our Home! 


We’re so glad you decided to book with us and we want to make sure you have a 5-star stay. We are very excited for you and hope that you enjoy your time.
 
If anything is not up to your standards, please report any dissatisfaction within the first 12 hours to us. It would be an honor for us to make your stay even better.

We have provided basic amenities including fresh towels, bathroom supplies, and coffee. Feel free to snack on anything in our refrigerator and enjoy refreshments.

If you have any questions don’t hesitate to contact us via our digital property guide or through the booking platform. 

Cheers!
